channel.title: PhpStorm on Rick Daalhuizen

item.title: Setting up PhpStorm for Magento 2
item.description: As a Magento developer you are dealing with a complex code-base that you have to navigate through. That is why it is useful to have an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) that helps you write your code and ensure its quality. Perhaps one of the most famous IDE for PHP developers is PHPStorm. PHPStorm comes out of the box with all the tools you need for writing PHP applications. Here are some tips and tricks about my PHPStorm configurations that I use as a Magento Developer on a daily basis.
